title: Car Selling
details: In this Project, I create individual admin panel for admin and user panel for users. Here users can order any product and also they can remove.

title: Food Delivery
details: Here Users can order food after login. They can see their order of food in My Order page. They can remove their order of food.

title: Mental Health Care
details: In our site, Users can see what type of mental disorder exists. They can also see what service we provide. They can get appointments after login.
